text: Jorge Masvidal (nickname Gamebred; born November 12, 1984 in Miami, Florida) is an American mixed martial artist. He currently competes in the lightweight and welterweight division for the Ultimate Fighting Championship. Masvidal has been competing professionally since 2003. he has also competed for Bellator, Strikeforce, Shark Fights, and World Victory Road. He holds the record for the fastest knockout in UFC history at five seconds, and holds the UFC BMF Championship belt. == References == == Other websites == * Jorge Masvidal Profile at UFC.com * * * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:American mixed martial artists
title: Jorge Masvidal
